flawed_nl_solution:
After the birds ate 19 of the tomatoes Haruto has 127 - 19 = <<127-19=108>>108 tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had 108 / 2 = <<108/2=45.0>>45.0 tomatoes.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54.0, not 45.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
